creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Yaroslav bandaging the monument of Ukrainian poet Taras Shevchenko damaged by Russian fire in Borodyanka, suburb of Kyiv. 29 residential buildings and many more private houses were ruined by Russian airstrikes on March 4 during the battle for Kyiv. According to city officials, there are confirmed bodies of residents under the rubbles. After the Russians retreated, emergency services started to clear rubbles.
